meanings.definition: A person who is clever or sarcastic in a humorous way.
meanings.sent1: The wiseguy in class always had a witty remark ready.
meanings.sent2: Don't take him seriously, he's just a wiseguy trying to make everyone laugh.
meanings.sent3: The wiseguy at the party had everyone in stitches with his jokes.
meanings.sent4: His wiseguy comments cut through the tension like a sharp knife.
meanings.sent5: The wiseguy's humor was like a refreshing breeze on a hot day.

meanings.definition: A member of the Mafia or organized crime.
meanings.sent1: The wiseguy was known for his connections in the underworld.
meanings.sent2: The wiseguy's presence made everyone nervous in the room.
meanings.sent3: The wiseguy's offer was too good to refuse, just like in the movies.
meanings.sent4: He moved through the city like a shadow, a wiseguy in every sense.
meanings.sent5: The wiseguy's reputation preceded him wherever he went.

meanings.definition: A person who is knowledgeable or experienced in a particular field.
meanings.sent1: The wiseguy of the group always had the answers to our questions.
meanings.sent2: When it came to cars, he was the wiseguy we all turned to for advice.
meanings.sent3: The wiseguy of the workshop could fix anything with just a wrench and a smile.
meanings.sent4: His wisdom shone through like a beacon, earning him the title of wiseguy.
meanings.sent5: The wiseguy's expertise was unmatched, making him an invaluable asset to the team.
